name: Pesugihan
description:
This work is an illustration of the practice of pesugihan depicted in a naive form.

Pesugihan is the practice of "asking" or wealth instantly at the expense of family members. In many cases, biological children often become victims to pesugihan practices and carried out by their parents.

The wealth obtained from this practice is a mortal form, the perpetrator of this practice will not prosper in their life. However, due to economic factors and lack of knowledge, this practice is still very fertile in various regions in Indonesia.
